ComicInfo.Summary:
The Gorgeous Ladies of Wrestling quickly realize that there’s no way they’re going to be able to beat these real, muscle-y professional wrestlers! With morale low, Ruth has to come up with a new plan, and she’s going to make sure they win—even if they have to lose!
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- Reg | Regular Cover | Hannah Templer | 1-2 | RI-A | 1:10 Retailer Incentive Variant Cover A | Nicoletta Baldari | 3 | RI-B | 1:25 Retailer Incentive Variant Cover B | Jenn St-Onge | 4 |
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-05-28 09:20:28. [CVDB712239]
ComicInfo.CoverArtist: Hannah Templer, Jenn St-Onge, Nicoletta Baldari
ComicInfo.Editor: Bobby Curnow, Elizabeth Brei, Megan Brown
